alert.note: Alert for Orange County Coastal; Orange County Inland; San Diego County Coastal Areas; San Diego County Inland Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 23 at 10:28AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern San Diego and southeastern Orange Counties through 1100 AM PST... At 1027 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dana Point, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mission Viejo, San Clemente, Laguna Beach, Dana Point, Camp Pendleton, Laguna Niguel, Aliso Viejo, San Juan Capistrano, San Onofre, Ortega Highway, Ladera Ranch and Coto De Caza. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
